member.name: F:Terra.Models.APIPlant.light
member.summary: Parsed after Sunlight is deserialized. Because of formatting purposes, this var is parsed using string.Join on Sunlight property to add "," to every element and displayed as a single string. Set as [ObservableProperty] to counter the delay in updating UI. To be binded with light content in PlantInfoPage.xml

member.name: F:Terra.Models.APIPlant.propagationMethods
member.summary: Parsed after Propagation is deserialized. Because of formatting purposes, this var is parsed using string.Join on Propagation property, adding ", " to every element and displayed as a single string. Set as [ObservableProperty] to counter the delay in updating UI. To be binded with propagation content in PlantInfoPage.xml

member.name: M:Terra.ViewModels.GraphicalPlantViewModel.AddDataPoint(System.Int32,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{LiveChartsCore.Defaults.ObservableValue})
member.summary: main: Add data point to line chart | explaination: Every line chart can show seven points at a time. With every extra point, we remove the oldest point (first point) in the chart, offset all points' position by minus one, then add the newest point at the end of the chart.
member.param: Data point to be added.
Target line chart.
